HPI 8167 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 Campeonato de España de Turismos (CET) Winner L. Pérez-Sala

An interesting choice for HPI on this one. Luis Pérez-Sala won the 1993 CET (or Spanish Touring Car Championship) series in this R32. This was the first, and only, title win for Godzilla in the Spanish championship.
